description: Communication Behaviour Impact on HIV in Albania

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacity of national institutions to manage the environment, protect cultural heritage and regulate economic policies.
subproject.description: The COMBI strategy proposed is behaviorally driven which would in future contribute to reduce risk of transmission of HIV, STI and early unwanted pregnancy. It focuses on that ultimate result of young people age 15-19 discussing sexual matters and choosing, if they so desire, to adhere to PSI (postponement of sexual intercourse) behavior; and those 15-50 years old already having sex to use a condom in every such sexual occasion,  when having sex with someone other than one’s regular partner. The strategy is based on some understanding of those factors which would hinder these behaviors and those factors which would facilitate them
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: COMBI on HIV - Behavior change

title: COMBI on HVI
